short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Extension that allows you to access your clickup WorkSpaces and Tasks!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unread For ClickUp, a simple chrome extension powered by ClickUp API,  specially made to simplify your experience with live  updates on your ClickUp tasks and it's  comments! 
Easy access to tasks created by you, and to the ones assigned to you. 
Want to check comments on your task? Check it on the go, just a click away. 
Want to check the task status? Check it on the go, just a click away.
Check through different workspaces, Folders and lists, with simplified minimalistic user interface.  
User Directions : 
-> Login using clickup credentials (reopen extension after login) 
-> Choose a Team (from top left menu) 
-> Choose a workspace
-> Choose a list
-> Tasks from that list will appear
-> You can then access the task details, statuses, comments. 
In dark mode, for the cult! :)
Actively under Development!
